text: Eugenio Dal Corso (16 May 1939 â€“ 20 October 2024) was an Italian prelate of the Catholic Church. He was the Coadjutor and Bishop of Saurimo from 1996 to 2008. He also was the Bishop of Benguela from 2008 to 2018. Pope Francis made him a cardinal in 2019. Dal Corso died on 20 October 2024 at a nursing home in Negrar di Valpolicella, Italy at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church
title: Eugenio Dal Corso
